goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (PDF 72.6 KB)
graph_title: Stopa smrtnosti koja se pripisuje kardiovaskularnim bolestima, karcinomu, dijabetesu ili hroničnim respiratornim bolestima
indicator_definition: Probability of dying between the ages of 30 and 70 years from cardiovascular diseases, cancer, diabetes or chronic respiratory diseases, defined as the per cent of 30-year-old-people who would die before their 70th birthday from cardiovascular disease, cancer, diabetes, or chronic respiratory disease, assuming that s/he would experience current mortality rates at every age and s/he would not die from any other cause of death.
indicator_name: Stopa smrtnosti koja se pripisuje kardiovaskularnim bolestima, karcinomu, dijabetesu ili hroničnim respiratornim bolestima
target_name: Do kraja 2030. smanjiti za jednu trećinu broj prijevremenih smrtnih slučajeva od nezaraznih bolesti kroz prevenciju i liječenje i promovisati mentalno zdravlje i blagostanje

graph_titles.series: Stopa smrtnosti uzrokovana kardiovaskularnim bolestima, rakom, dijabetesom
graph_titles.title: Stopa smrtnosti uzrokovana kardiovaskularnim bolestima, rakom, dijabetesom

graph_titles.series: Broj umrlih uzrokovan nezaraznim bolestima, prema vrsti bolesti i splu (broj)
